snippet: Stephen Curry made eight 3-pointers and finished with 36 points and 12 assists, helping Golden State beat host Miami, 123-114, to extend its winning streak to seven.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry made eight 3-pointers and finished with 36 points and 12 assists, helping Golden State beat host Miami, 123-114, to extend its winning streak to seven.

headline.main: Curry Leads Warriors Past Heat in a Shootout
headline.print_headline: Curry Leads Warriors Past Heat in a Shootout
